author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 310.82 crore has been donated to the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund so far towards flood relief and restoration work.

On January 13 alone, a sum of Rs. 3.26 crore was donated by Tamilnadu Mercantile Bank (Rs. two crore), Suzlon Energy Limited (Rs. one crore) and Kumudham Publications Private Limited (Rs. 26.47 lakh), a release from the State government said.
title: Rs. 310 cr. donated to relief fund
